item.description:
HAPPY HOUR TIME FOR SINGLES
With “THE IRA”!!!

When:

THURSDAY, APRIL 16

Where:

The Mill on the River
989 Ellington Road
South Windsor, CT 06074

Tel: 860.289.7929

One Low Price – Food AND drinks only $18.00
(Slight price increase from last week for more and better food choices)

Happy Hour Prices from 5-7PM.
Our area open till 9:00PM

This past Thursday was a tremendous success. We had over 50 Singles enjoying themselves with food, beverages, and mingling at it’s very best.

Let’s Break the Ice….
6:00PM
Meet and Greet Singles Line: Women in one line, men in an opposite, rotating line. A 30 Second Introduction to help “break the ice”!!! Don’t miss out on this wonderful way to meet people!!!!!!

DETAILS:

We have an Exclusive Area downstairs, which will include a Private Patio with dramatic Waterfall view, linen tablecloths with scented candles, and our own knowledgeable and attentive Bar and Wait Staff.

One Low Price for All - just- $ 18.00.
(Same cost if you do not have a mixed drink)

The cold hors d’oeuvres, such as cheese and crackers, antipasto, roasted veggies, and more will be set-up buffet style. Our chef will select some hot hors d’oeuvres that will be butler-passed from 5:00 – 7:00.

We will provide each guest with TWO DRINK TICKETS that will be available for complimentary Happy Hour Drinks from 5:00 – 7:00. NOTE: IF you prefer, you may pay the difference to upgrade from the house brand.
Not much of a drinker, feel free to sell your drink ticket(s) to others to utilize between 5-7.
At 7:00, the bar will change to cash & carry at regular prices.

Don’t miss out on the fun, AND entertainment of Ira!!!!!

See pictures from last week’s Happy Hour: What a nice looking group!!!!!
http://www.meetup.com...

Filled with fun, stimulating conversation, meeting new folks, and enjoying the Happy Hour Food and Drink Specials. Celebrate Every Thursday of the week and maybe meet your “Special Person”.



Please RSVP No Later than 9:00AM, Thursday April 16, so the restaurant can determine how much delicious food to prepare.

Ira Wettenstein- 860-604-5792- mistrchrming@aol.com

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: A MOST TERRIFIC HAPPY HOUR WITH A NEW TWIST
